alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:14PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Jackson and northeastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 145 PM CDT... At 114 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northwest of Blountstown, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marianna, Cottondale, Greenwood, Altha, Selman, Blue Spring, Union City, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Camps Head, Star, Alliance, Marianna Municipal A/P, Kynesville, Chason, Steele City, Sink Creek, Willis, Simsville and Cypress. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
